page.title: 16Biography
page.content: Reuban Bishop was born and lived in Macclesfield before the First World War.He grew up with Charles Tunnicliffe famous for his paintings of birds.He now lives at Windy Ridge,a semi-detached cottage,on the old shore road between Pilling Land and Pilling (03800496). Mr Bishop believes in being as self-sufficient as possible.To this end he has designed and built his own wind generator,which is a landmark for any walker down our sea wall.He is the only person,as far as we know,who operates his own methane gas plant,this based on a design of Ram Bux Sing.He does most of his cooking with the gas but intends to convert his car to use it too.We think that Mr Reuben Bishop is a man born before his time and soon we will have to turn to production of methane and to wind generation of electricity.
